strings: <voice_0x01001CFA><se_high>Princess Medea: Congratulations! Champion of the Monster Arena! What a wonderful achievement!

<voice_0x01001CFB><se_high>Princess Medea: I must say, that statue of you does look
rather dashing. The sculptor is clearly an admirer of yours!
<voice_0x01001CFC><se_high>Princess Medea: And I understand Morrie has decided to accompany us on our travels. He obviously thinks very highly of you too.

<voice_0x01001CFD><se_high>Princess Medea: I had no idea that he had built the Monster
Arena expressly to find someone more skilled
at monster battling than himself.
<voice_0x01001CFE><se_high>Princess Medea: What a wonderful dream to have fulfilled.
<voice_0x01001CFF><se_high>Princess Medea: How about you? Do you have a dream?
<voice_0x01001D00><se_high>Princess Medea: Well, when all of this is over, you must be sure to pursue it.
<voice_0x01001D01><se_high>Princess Medea: And should I ever be rid of this curse, I would like nothing more than to help you.
<voice_0x01001D02><se_high>Princess Medea: It would be my way of saying thank you for all the many times you've helped me.
